titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on BEPD70L.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 2/8/2005--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2008, the duty on the mixture of BEPD and neopentyl glycol (BEPD70L).
